mapper.insert: insert into building (ID, type, itemName, price, img, itemFrom, info, address, decStatus) values (#{ID}, #{type}, #{itemName}, #{price}, #{img}, #{itemFrom}, #{info}, #{address}, #{decStatus});
insert into property_building (ID, buildingID, saleStatus) VALUES (#{ID}, #{buildingID}, #{saleStatus})
insert into rent (ID, buildingID, area) VALUES (#{ID}, #{buildingID}, #{area})
